App.AdditionalNotes: If you have any queries or issues, please drop me a message. I will get back to you ASAP

Items.Item: Ticket Purchase Cineworld do not have ticket purchasing API. Their own apps use in-app browser to purchase tickets. This is something that isn't in my control. There are issues with mobile website and checkboxes - accepting booking T & Cs and using stored card details. Cineworld is aware of this. FYI, with Windows Phone 8.1 I can see that the checkboxes behave properly so either way fix is on its way.
